document.full_text: thousands took to the streets of morocco on sunday in peaceful demonstrations to demand sweeping reforms and an end to political detention, the third day of mass protests since they began in february.
document.title: thousands of protesters demand "a new morocco"
lines_and_colors: thousands took to the streets of morocco on sunday in peaceful demonstrations to demand sweeping reforms and an end to political detention, the third day of mass protests since they began in february.
